ThingDef.label: Minor Helmet
ThingDef.description: A sleek and sturdy desgined helmet ment to fit the lower ranks of Covenant sangheili forces.

ThingDef.description: Fashioned in blue for the lower ranks of Covenant sangheili forces.

ThingDef.description: Ranger aka Jump trooper of the Covenant sangheili forces.

ThingDef.label: Major Helmet
ThingDef.description: reinforced design of the minor helmet meant to fit the some of the commanding ranks of Covenant sangheili ground forces. This is one piece of a set of armor denoting a warrior's rank and capabilities in combat.

ThingDef.label: Major Armor
ThingDef.description: reinforced design of the minor helmet meant to fit the some of the commanding ranks of Covenant sangheili ground forces. This is one piece of a set of armor denoting a warrior's rank and capabilities in combat.

ThingDef.label: SpecOps Helmet
ThingDef.description: Only worn by the Spec Ops of units in the sangheili military, this helmet sports Top of the line Conenant engery shield protection from most forms of incoming damage.

ThingDef.label: SpecOps Armor
ThingDef.description: Only worn by the Spec Ops of units in the sangheili military, this Armor sports Top of the line Conenant engery shield protection from most forms of incoming damage.

ThingDef.label: Ultra Helmet
ThingDef.description: Distinctive in shape and color, this helmet design is a symbol of a sangheili's abilites in battle. Only worn by the top tier of units in the sangheili military, this helmet sports Top of the line Conenant engery shield protection from most forms of incoming damage.

ThingDef.label: Ultra Armor
ThingDef.description: Distinctive in shape and color, this helmet design is a symbol of a sangheili's abilites in battle. Only worn by the top tier of units in the sangheili military, this helmet sports Top of the line Conenant engery shield protection from most forms of incoming damage.

ThingDef.label: Arbiter Helmet
ThingDef.description: A Arbiter's Helmet

ThingDef.label: Arbiter Armor
ThingDef.description: A Arbiter's armor is made of a dark silvery-bronze metal and is more akin to a suit of human medieval armor. Notably, it includes a distinctive helmet with a curved hawk-like "beak" covering the face. The armor is secured to the Arbiter's combat suit by blue form-fitting straps and is composed of various segmented plates.
